biotools.summary: Chromatin looping is an essential feature of eukaryotic genomes and can bring regulatory sequences, such as enhancers or transcription factor binding sites, in the close physical proximity of regulated target genes. This package uses protein binding signals from ChIP-seq and sequence motif information to predict chromatin looping events.
